slides.title: Impact on IT Spending
slides.content: Recessions typically lead to reduced IT spending across various sectors. Companies may delay or cancel projects, prioritize cost-cutting measures, and reduce investments in new technologies.  Key areas affected include hardware, software, and IT services.
